newsitem.title: USA: Burlington Coat Q1 sales rise to $310 mln.
newsitem.headline: Burlington Coat Q1 sales rise to $310 mln.

text.p: Burlington Coat Factory Warehouse Corp said on Friday that it had net sales of $310 million for the first quarter ended September 28 compared with $291 million in the same period last year.
The company said in a statement comparative same store sales increased 1.2 percent in the first quarter against the same period last year.
